reply.question: 1. Does the app declare the collection of data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the collection of data.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that data is collected and outlines the types of data collected as well as the purposes for which the data is collected.
reply.reference: We process data that we have collected about you in accordance with this policy in different ways. How we process your data will largely depend on whether you are using our services as a visitor, or as a Member Account Holder or an Admin Account Holder. To make this simple, we’ve broken down the categories of users of our services. Each section sets out how and why information is collected about our different user groups with reference to the type of Personal Information set out in the above table. URL: https://entegy.com.au/privacy-policy

reply.question: 2. If the app declares the collection of data, what type of data does it collect?

answer.full_answer: The app collects contact information, account information, profile information, social media information, additional user information, computer and mobile device information, information from cookies and similar technologies.

content: Information from cookies and similar technologies

reply.analysis: The answer is derived from the specific types of data mentioned in the privacy policy document in relation to the collection of data by the app.

reply.question: 3. Does the app declare the purpose of data collection and use?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the purpose of data collection and use.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that the app declares the purpose of data collection and use, outlining various reasons for collecting and processing personal information.
reply.reference: In the collection and use of the above Personal Information we will also employ profiling and utilise machine learning in order to provide more accurate and detailed statistics regarding the nature of the data being collected. This information will usually be provided to Admin Account Holders. Although we do not control how Admin Account Holders use your Personal Information, it is likely that such Personal Information will be used to make decisions about your preferences as a consumer and to tailor marketing and promotional material to be more relevant towards you. URL: https://entegy.com.au/privacy-policy

reply.question: 4. Can the user opt out of data collection or delete data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the user can opt-out of data collection.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that users will be able to opt-out of data collection at any time, indicating that users have the option to control their data collection preferences.
reply.reference: Users will be able to opt-out at any time. URL: https://entegy.com.au/privacy-policy

reply.question: 5. Does the app share data with third parties?

answer.full_answer: No, the app does not share data with third parties.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that the app does not share data with third parties.
reply.reference: We do not currently allow any third-party web beacons to be utilised on the Site. URL: https://entegy.com.au/privacy-policy

reply.question: 6. If the app shares data with third parties, what third parties does the app share data with?

answer.full_answer: The app shares data with third parties including authorised service providers, advertising partners, and ad networks.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy mentions that the app may allow third parties, including authorised service providers, advertising partners, and ad networks, to serve advertisements on the site. It also advises users to review the privacy policies of any third party they provide information to.
reply.reference: Third parties, including our authorised service providers, advertising partners and ad networks to serve advertisements on our Site. If you provide a third party with information directly, we strongly recommend you first review the privacy policy of the relevant third party. URL: https://entegy.com.au/privacy-policy
